DataElement.preferredName: Immune Related Response Criterion Use Assessment Reason Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The response that describes the reason why the immune related response criterion was selected for the technique used to evaluate disease response.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Modified Overall Immune Related Response Criterion Use
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A measure proposed by Wolchok et al. (Clin Cancer Res 2009;15:7412-7420) to determine the extent of an antitumor response to a particular immunotherapeutic agent._A manner, or usual, or accepted practice of using something.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Modified Overall Immune Related Response Criterion
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A measure proposed by Wolchok et al. (Clin Cancer Res 2009;15:7412-7420) to determine the extent of an antitumor response to a particular immunotherapeutic agent.

Concepts.longName: Modified Overall Immune Related Response Criterion
Concepts.definition: A measure proposed by Wolchok et al. (Clin Cancer Res 2009;15:7412-7420) to determine the extent of an antitumor response to a particular immunotherapeutic agent.

Property.preferredDefinition: Use; put into service; make work or employ (something) for a particular purpose or for its inherent or natural purpose.
